casebody.data:
RIEGER
v.
GIANT EAGLE, INC. 2018-0883 Supreme Court of Ohio. November 21, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell and DeWine, JJ., dissent.

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

On motion for reconsideration. Motion granted. The court accepts the appeal on proposition of law Nos. I and III. Briefing schedule reset. Appellant shall file a brief within 40 days, and the parties shall otherwise proceed in accordance with S.Ct.Prac.R. 16.02 through 16.07.
